div.p: Bootstrap Protected Mode Interrupts Memory Scheduling Syscall

text.tspan: (Physical Reality CPU at reset = 16-bit real mode)

g.text: MILESTONE 2 IDT, PIC REMAP, TIMER & KEYBOARD
MILESTONE 3 PMM, PAGE TABLES & KERNEL HEAP
MILESTONE 4 PCB, CONTEXT SWITCH, SCHEDULER & SYSCALL

text.tspan: Fix collision: IRQ0 was vec 8 = Double Fault!
pusha seg saves call C handler
Error code bits: P - W - U
Halt now; demand paging in M4+
1. Load all 3 args into regs (before esp change!)
3. esp = new_esp (pivot to next process stack)
4. cmp cr3, new_cr3; jne reload (skip if same PD)
5. ret back to irq_common_stub exit path
popa iret restore NEXT process state
TSS.ESP0 = current proc kernel stack top
CPU reads ESP0 on EVERY ring3ring0
CR3 = phys addr of user PD
SYS_WRITE(4): validate buf in user space
Page faults on kernel addr access
